content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'Ola de calor':

content.stimulus_en: This is the (bad) ________ storm ever.
The (high) ________ temperature was 45 degrees.
It was the (scary) ________ experience.
It is the (hot) ________ day of the year.
This is the (beautiful) ________ sunset.
What is the (cold) ________ place on Earth?
The hurricane caused a lot of damage.
The was village affected by a big flood.
The heatwave lasted for two weeks.
I scared am of thunder and lightning.
It's freezing outside, you should wear a coat.
There heavy was rain and strong winds all night.
